topic.title: Lightweight DITA Open Repository
topic.shortdesc: Here you will find information about the purpose and people behind the LwDITA open repository.

body.p: Within GitHub, a public repository ( https://github.com/oasis-open/dita-lightweight ) exists to "contain schema files, tools and documents related to developing a specification for a light version of DITA. These files will be set up to be as useful as possible for people who want to use them and contribute to them." Essentially, this repository holds information and tools related to the continued efforts to created and integrate LwDITA into the main DITA.

While this repository is public, it is maintained by 3 individuals, responsible for overseeing the project's development, any pull requests on the repository, and overall maintaining the "openness" of the repository. These trusted experts currently include:

li.p: Don R. Day, OASIS Individual Member
